attributes.action: ensure that the damage to Greenwich Park and the restrictions in access to the Park which will be caused by the Olympic 2012 equestrian events are reduced by moving at least the cross country events to a more suitable location
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that the damage to Greenwich Park and the restrictions in access to the Park which will be caused by the Olympic 2012 equestrian events are reduced by moving at least the cross country events to a more suitable location."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20554


Prime Minister's Office
